short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gift from your favorite sites using Revsend Pro.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the official V2 RevSend Extension for Google Chrome! 
Use this extension to integrate your favorite retail stores with the RevSend app. 

Steps:
1. Install this extension
2. Visit any of our approved marketplace including Amazon.com
3. Click the RevSend logo on a product page to pull in product details
4. You will be redirect back to the RevSend app for item fulfillment
